**********
Bozepy
**********

Introduction
============
|Bozepy| is a set of routines that are used to reduce data from MSU's smaller telescopes.  The :mod:`~bozepy.ccdproc` package is for
general CCD data reduction and :mod:`~bozepy.phot` contains routines for basic photometry analysis of an image.

   :maxdepth: 1

   gettingstarted
   modules
